snippet.title: Razer: Pete Evans releases new wellness 'doco' as philosophy and science crumble to low-carb dust
snippet.content: Oh, shit. Pete Evans has a ; one that makes the claim that "food is medicine" and that tragic and common disorders like Alzheimer's can be undone by the power of leafy greens. I could do as I have and spend the day on the phone to biochemistry departments in the effort to understand how Evans' foundational assumptions about the , those based on the "research" of a "wellness expert" whose single enumerated qualification seems to be that she was "", are demonstrably bunkum.
